content: Excelent tips. But lately, I’ve been thinking in a frequent problem I face when I choose a relaxed, more genuine writing style. My clients don’t like this relaxed style, even when I’m the “expert” and I trust in its effectiveness. In the corporate world, the same happens. Once, I was prospecting distributors in Germany for a cosmetic company and not using an hardcore formal style wasn’t a real option. Hope this mindset adjust soon enough.
